Articles.Content:
Ok, recently, Voyager275 and I have challenged each other to a Space Race (exact goal to be decided later). To make things interesting, we are going to start out small, we are NOT allowed to use craft or rockets we have previously built, 30 days between launches, and reporting will differ between us. Each one of us will represent the US and one of us will represent the Soviet Union in the way we represent. First launches are scheduled for tomorrow.

We ask that you please pm either Voyager275 or myself of your intention to join. Those who have joined already are exempt from this rule. Also, we have decided to pair you off into a 1v1 races.

Edited October 6, 2015 by Sampa
Subbed!
Looks good. Subbed.
One of you guys will be using the Stock-like soviet pack?

One of you guys will be using the Stock-like soviet pack?

Tantares? No, but I will use the baikonur style space center

Sounding rockets were launched this morning. Sunlight 1 and 2.

Sunlight 1 went up first, but upon landing it's science payload exploded.

Sunlight 2 was the last sounding rocket, it's fins were angled to start a spin, unfortunately the science onboard suffered Sunlight 1's fate
Launch video of my sounding rockets coming

FIRST SATELLITE! Horizon 1

Today Horizon 1 became the first satellite in Kerbin Orbit. PE:116,567 AP:258,530

Horizon 1 also broke the hearts of many sci-fi fans. There is no air in space, and the rocket needed more power than a cannon to reach orbit.
Eletin 1 has achieved orbit Successfully! After two launches, one in which an unfortunate incident caused by a drunk engineer, the wrong second stage engine was installed.

Ok, thirty days after the success of Eletin 1, The United Kerbal Union has successfully launched the first satellite equipped with solar panels into a 30 degree orbit, This mission successfully proves that solar panels can and will work in space.

Edited October 3, 2015 by Sampa

Kaila the squidpup became the first living creature in orbit onboard Horizon 2. PE:115,684 AP:171,468

Edited October 3, 2015 by Voyager275
It seems to me like Sampa was doing Soviet-style but you mentioned Kapitalism. Explain?

We decided to switch the kind of satellites for fun!

btw, Tiros 1, Kerbin's first weather satellite is in orbit.

This satellite was launched aboard the very successful Astro II booster to an Apoapsis of 110 km on a 50 degree incline. it is expected to serve as a primary form of meteorology and better weather tracking for years to come.

Edited October 3, 2015 by Sampa

First Mun Probe

Traveler 1 was sent towards the Mun. Unfortunately, a incorrect burn caused it to miss the Mun. It then fell back towards Kerbin and burned up. It did flyby the Mun and got what was named a "free return trajectory"

- - - Updated - - -

The probes planned tomorrow will be Traveler 2-4, and maybe a surprise mission.

First Mun Impactor

Traveler 2 became the first probe to crash into a celestial object besides Kerbin.
United Kerbin Union Space Program Planning a Duna Impactor mission
May I join this as ESA or something? It looks pretty intresting
I don't see why not! Voyager, what do you think?

I think I'll be the Kerbnese:cool:

Writing my manifest now.
I will join as the ESA.

I don't see why not! Voyager, what do you think?

I think it would work, a community space race is great

That's pretty freaking cool

- - - Updated - - -

Watch your tails, you Kapitalist and Koviet Scum!!! The Kerbnese will beat you in every way. Just give us 20 years.
Moar!!!
Are there certain mods I can and can not use?
